channel.title: Save On The Ray-Ban RX5184
channel.description: Ray-Ban was the offshoot of German eye wear company Bausch and Lomb. In 1937, Lt John McCready of the United States Air Force came back from a hot air balloon trip and complained that his eyes were damaged from flying too close to the sun for prolonged periods. He approached Bausch and Lomb and asked [...]

item.title: Save On The Ray-Ban RX5184

Ray-Ban was the offshoot of German eye wear company Bausch and Lomb. In 1937, Lt John McCready of the United States Air Force came back from a hot air balloon trip and complained that his eyes were damaged from flying too close to the sun for prolonged periods. He approached Bausch and Lomb and asked [...]
